titleStmt.title: A real vindication of Dr. B ̲̲̲̲̲from the base and scandalous affronts put upon him, in two late scurrilous pamphlets, intituled, The last words and sayings of the true Protes

notesStmt.note: The "Dr. B" referred to in the two cited broadsides is Gilbert Burnet, later Bishop of Sarum.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
